Order Views¶

class orders.views.OrderViewSet(**kwargs)[source]¶

API endpoint that allows normal users to make an order and admins to get total revenue.

create(request, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Only normal user can create an order.

perform_create(serializer=<class 'orders.serializers.OrderSerializer'>)[source]¶

set the requester as the buyer.

serializer_class¶

alias of orders.serializers.OrderSerializer

total_revenue(request)[source]¶

admins only can get the sum of all purchased items.
